A School for Wizards.setting: The entrance of Silverquill School of Wizardry
A School for Wizards.background1: A white haired wizard known for his fancy attire and tall blue hat. He carries a staff made of elderwood.
A School for Wizards.background2: A tired dwarf blacksmith who has turned to the sword. He is an adventurer and wears handcrafted metal armor.

You meet in a Tavern.background1: A bald man in armor. A holy knight.
You meet in a Tavern.background2: A charming grinning handsome man with a pint of ale

Here be Pirates.background1: A fierce pirate. He has an eyepatch, and a hook for a hand.
Here be Pirates.background2: A timid pirate in a french sailor outfit.

On the road to Eldenshire.setting: The road between Hog's Landing and Eldenshire
On the road to Eldenshire.background1: A hippie druid in tattered brown robes. She wears glasses, bookish.
On the road to Eldenshire.background2: A somber elf rogue in leather armor.

Dragon Heist.background1: A hobbit halfling with messy hair.
Dragon Heist.background2: A glum man in adventurer's clothes.

Beowulf.setting: the great hall, Heorot, moments before disaster. Output type: Epic Poem only.

Peter Pan.setting: The deck of Captain Hook's ship; Neverland
Peter Pan.class1: Optimistic, adventure-seeking lost boy, can fly
Peter Pan.class2: Loyal, vindictive, can only feel one emotion at a time

Sherlock.setting: A crime scene in an old victorian mansion

Boldly Going.setting: The Bridge of a private star cruiser
Boldly Going.background1: A captain of the Galactic Empire who wears military garb. He has slick black hair and sharp blue eyes
Boldly Going.background2: A First Lieutenant of the Galactic Empire who wears military garb. SHe has slick red hair and sharp green eyes

Aliens.background1: An Alien with green skin and a space suit.
Aliens.background2: An Alien with blue skin and a space suit.

Crash Landed.setting: In the wreckage of a spaceship, on the planet Zarnok 9. Start by telling the player about the planet.

The Holodeck.setting: The Doors to the Holodeck. Ask the player what they would like to simulate.
The Holodeck.background1: A man with brown hair and simple features.
The Holodeck.background2: A woman with brown hair and simple features.

A Train Robbery.background1: A famous western outlaw known for his cowboy hat and six-shooter. He rides a horse faster than any other
A Train Robbery.background2: A famous western outlaw known for bandana mask and six-shooters. He rides a bucking bronco

A shoot out.setting: High Noon in the town square, facing down an outlaw
A shoot out.background1: A sharp sheriff of the old west. He has a thick handlebar mustache and a raised eyebrow
A shoot out.background2: A sheriff of the wild west. He has a sweaty brow and a large hat.

Cattle Run.background1: A cattle rancher with black hair and stubble.
Cattle Run.background2: A cattle rancher with brown hair and stubble.

Bounty Hunters.class2: Trusting, prone to repeating his partner.

A First Date.background1: A beautiful woman with long black hair and sharp features. She wears a fancy dress.
A First Date.background2: A handsome man with rugged features and kind eyes. He wears a nice flannel shirt.

First Day of School.setting: The first day of 9th Grade. Gamemode: combat disabled.
First Day of School.background1: A male highschool freshman with acne and a goofy look.

Not a Licensed Therapist.setting: The Therapist's Office. Game Mode: Conversation only.
Not a Licensed Therapist.background1: A distraught man dealing with grief and sadness. Crying
Not a Licensed Therapist.background2: A kind woman who is a therapist

Not a Lawyer.background1: A kind lawyer in a suit. He wears a well-fitting suit and a red tie. He has a kind, rugged face.
Not a Lawyer.background2: An untrustworthy lawyer in a sloppy suit. He has messy hair and a wicked grin.

Maybe a Comedian.background1: A mid-thiries man with short curly black hair and a long face. He is telling a joke on stage with a microphone
Maybe a Comedian.background2: A large group of people sitting in an audience

Cats.background1: A white fluffy cat with yellow eyes.
Cats.background2: A large orange cat with a goofy expression

Hedgehogs.background1: A red anthropomorphic hedgehog moving at sonic speeds and wearing shoes, deviant art, low quality, fursuit, fan-art, OC
Hedgehogs.background2: A purple anthropomorphic hedgehog moving really fast and wearing shoes and sunglasses, deviant art, low quality, fursuit, fan-art, OC

Bank Run.class2: in a state of bank collapse
Bank Run.background1: An older woman with a short gray bob-cut haircut. She wears a pant suit

Just let me talk to the AI.setting: Conversation. Instead of playing a game, let's just talk.

Alone, together.setting: In a coffee shop. In this scenario Older Linda offers advise to her younger self.
Alone, together.background1: A thirty-year old woman with brown hair and glasses. She wears a lab coat.
Alone, together.background2: A fifty-five-year old woman with grey brown hair and glasses. She wears a tattered lab coat.

John Hancock.setting: The Signing of the Declaration of Independence

Cavemen.setting: A cold cave, year 300000 BC, before the invention of fire.
Cavemen.background1: A handsome caveman in a fur tunic. He has a club
Cavemen.background2: A caveman in a fur tunic. He has a stern expression.

Ben Franklin.background2: A key on a kitestring during a thunderstorm

Et tu, Brute?.class1: Noble, power hungry, weak to stabbings
Et tu, Brute?.class2: Noble, power hungry, stabby (secretly plotting to assassinate Caesar)
